description: The series, which is set in Jersey, saw film crews visiting for two weeks at various locations.
title: Bergerac: Which Jersey locations are featured in the new series?
title_page: Bergerac: Which Jersey locations are featured in the new series? - BBC News
maintext:
With the release of the new version of the television series Bergerac, actors say the real star of the show is the island of Jersey, and it looks "amazing" in the programme.
Actors and guests walked the red-carpet at a local premiere on Monday, where the first episode of the six-part series was screened.
Damien Molony, who plays detective Jim Bergerac, said he and his family loved the island and could not wait to come back together in future.
He said he has been to visit the island three times since filming the show, most recently to spend a weekend in Gorey walking the oyster beds and visiting Mont Orgueil Castle.
Jersey-born actor Timothy Renouf, who plays Julien Wakefield, previously said Jersey was a "lead character".
He said being on the island made filming scenes relaxing for the cast because the location did "half the work".
Actor Ayehsa Antoine, who plays Chloe, said she hoped people in Jersey would be proud of the series.
"It looks so beautiful, the show, the island is in all its glory," she said.
